logout.message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

default-message.api-error-client: Your web browser sent an invalid request
default-message.api-error-unknown: Your web browser can not make a request

default-message.response-status-403: You don't have right to access this page
default-message.response-status-404: You accessed to a non exising resource
